page.title: 10Communications,Helford Area.
page.content: The Manaccan automatic telephone exchange covers our area within the Truro district. All farms and most houses have telephones. Manaccan, St Martin and Helford have Post Offices with twice daily collections, one on Saturday none on Sunday. Post delivered once daily. Walkie talkie radio used by doctors, police and customs. C.B.enthusiasts. Media Usual B.B.C. I.T.V. available National, local and village papers available. Information systems _ Travelling library visits fortnightly. Gov't information at P.O. Notice boards in villages. Transport: School buses to Mullion Helston and Camborne. Bus to Helston 3 times weekly. Roads narrow, winding with high hedges. Summer ferry across Helford river.
